mapper.select: SELECT psa.id psa_id, psav.id psav_id, psa.*, psav.*, if(ssav.sku_id,1,0) isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr psa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value psav ON psa.sale_attr_id = psav.sale_attr_id AND psa.product_id = psav.product_id AND psa.product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssav.sku_id = #{skuId} and ssav.sale_attr_id=psa.sale_attr_id AND ssav.sale_attr_value_id = psav.id
